column6: sister and friend. she loved her grandchildren more than life itself. she was a master cake decorator at carvel and loved to go shopping. more that anything she loved her family and would do anything for them. through all of her medical battles no one ever heard her complain and she always had a smile on her face. she was and still is our hero and the wind beneath our wings. we will always love you forever. upcoming events. closing prayers. jun 15. 11:30 am robertaccio funeral home
